code: import React from'react';import{CircularProgress,CircularProgressLabel,Text,VStack}from'@chakra-ui/react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ConcentrationMeter=_ref=>{let{concentration}=_ref;const getLabel=()=>{if(concentration<30)return'需要集中';if(concentration<60)return'良好';return'优秀';};const getColor=()=>{if(concentration<30)return'red.400';if(concentration<60)return'yellow.400';return'green.400';};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(VStack,{spacing:2,py:4,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{fontSize:"sm",color:"gray.600",fontWeight:"medium",children:"\u4E13\u6CE8\u5EA6\u6C34\u5E73"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CircularProgress,{value:concentration,size:"120px",thickness:"12px",color:getColor(),trackColor:"gray.200",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CircularProgressLabel,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(VStack,{spacing:0,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Text,{fontSize:"2xl",fontWeight:"bold",children:[Math.round(concentration),"%"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{fontSize:"xs",color:"gray.500",children:getLabel()})]})})})]});};export default/*#__PURE__*/React.memo(ConcentrationMeter);
